definition: warp (the vertical threads in weaving)/vertical/longitudinal/north-south (lines of longitude)/lengthwise/to release/to indulge/even if
to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook

sentences.english: Throughout their history, the pyramids of Giza have stimulated human imagination.
sentences.chinese: 纵观历史，吉萨金子塔激发了人类的想象。

sentences.english: This's our opportunity to step back.
sentences.chinese: 那样我们才可以纵观全局。

sentences.english: Throughout Shu-shan Wen-hai, with regard to the interpretation of love can be described are mixed.
sentences.chinese: 纵观书山文海，关于爱情的诠释可谓是众说纷纭。

sentences.english: Throughout the world, more people are killed by mosquito-borne illness than any other factor.
sentences.chinese: 纵观世界，更多的人死于由蚊蝇引发的疾病。

sentences.english: Comparing it with other works of the same genre in the history, people can find its characteristics of inheritance and improvement.
sentences.chinese: 纵观历史上同类题材，自能发现它的继承和超越之处。

sentences.english: On the whole, the spatial relationship is the key of the western art history.
sentences.chinese: 纵观西方美术史，空间关系历来是画面关系的重点。

sentences.english: By means of this software, called Multi-Media Education Control System abbrev.
sentences.chinese: 纵观现有的多媒体教学软件，均缺少控制。

sentences.english: But, despite huge upheavals in the world, little has altered.
sentences.chinese: 纵观国际社会乱象纷生，联合国却几乎一成不变。

sentences.english: The underneath is the standpoint that the water demon takes a wide view some movie review a collection editor.
sentences.chinese: 下面是水妖纵观一些影评搜集编辑的观点。

sentences.english: Review whole bedroom, profusion colour is wanton jump move, harmonious and not messy.
sentences.chinese: 纵观整个居室，缤纷色彩肆意跃动，和谐而不零乱。

sentences.english: Withallthedeals last year, in vestment investment banks did well.
sentences.chinese: 纵观去年所有铰易，投资银行做得很好。

sentences.english: Throughout modern history, technological breakthroughs regularly surpass the people who invent them.
sentences.chinese: 纵观整个现代史，技术突破时常超过发明技术的人类。

sentences.english: Seeing my whole education history, I have many teachers.
sentences.chinese: 纵观我整个受教育史，我有过很多老师。

sentences.english: M usic's interconnection with society can be seen throughout history.
sentences.chinese: 纵观历史，音乐的社会互联作用随处可见。

sentences.english: Throughout Zong 's life, the most glorious is to recover 1/6 of the national territories.
sentences.chinese: 纵观左宗棠的一生，最辉煌的是收复六分之一的国土。

sentences.english: Historically, of course, this makes a lot of sense.
sentences.chinese: 纵观历史，这些当然有很大的意义。

definition: to take a broad view of sth
by contrast/but as for this.../viewed from another angle/subjectively/introspection
